revised_title: Stability and Instability of Solitary Waves of Korteweg-de Vries Type
tldr: This article investigates the stability and instability properties of solitary-wave solutions for a general class of equations, including the Korteweg-de Vries and Benjamin-Ono equations. The main result states that a solitary wave is stable if the function is convex. The authors provide a proof of instability for certain cases and establish stability for others using a Lyapunov functional and a mass-related improper integral.
